abilities.name: Macro-extinction Protocols
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a **MONSTER** or **VEHICLE** unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If that target is **TITANIC** or **TOWERING**, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

abilities.name: Consumed with Hunger
abilities.rule: While a friendly **WAR DOG** model is within 6" of this model, each time that **WAR DOG** model makes an attack that targets a **TITANIC** or **TOWERING** unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
